title: Burnham would ‘probably’ have won byelection, says Labour deputy leader
description: Lucy Powell calls for party to make more use of Greater Manchester mayor after Gorton and Denton defeat
content:
Andy Burnham would have won the Gorton and Denton byelection, Labour’s deputy leader said as she called for the party to make more use of the Greater Manchester mayor.
Overturning a 13,000 Labour majority from the general election, Hannah Spencer, a ... [2419 chars]

title: Cabinet Office minister Josh Simons resigns after Labour Together claims
description: Simons faced claims the think tank he used to run commissioned a report which looked into the background of journalists.
content:
Labour MP Josh Simons has resigned as a Cabinet Office minister, just days after Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer asked his ethics adviser to investigate him.
Simons faced claims the think tank he used to run before he became an MP commissioned a repo... [2863 chars]

title: Burnham would probably have won by-election, Labour deputy leader says
description: Lucy Powell tells the BBC that Labour needs to make more use of the Greater Manchester mayor.
content:
Andy Burnham would probably have won the Gorton and Denton by-election had he been allowed to stand, Labour's deputy leader has said.
Lucy Powell told the BBC's Newscast podcast that Labour needed to make more use of the Greater Manchester mayor, aft... [1393 chars]

title: Preston North End 0-2 Millwall: Lions close gap on top two
description: Championship high-fliers Millwall close the gap to second-placed Middlesbrough to one point with victory at Preston.
content:
Championship high-flyers Millwall closed the gap to second-placed Middlesbrough to one point with victory at stumbling Preston North End.
